content.text: {'query': 'AI news', 'follow_up_questions': None, 'answer': None, 'images': [], 'results': [{'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/@AINewsOfficial', 'title': 'AI News - YouTube', 'content': 'AI News delivers the latest breakthroughs in artificial intelligence, machine learning, deep learning, brain computer interface, robotics, and other future', 'score': 0.9998416, 'raw_content': None}, {'url': 'https://www.crescendo.ai/news/latest-ai-news-and-updates', 'title': 'Latest AI News and AI Breakthroughs that Matter Most: 2026 & 2025', 'content': '**Summary:** L’Oréal has officially incorporated generative AI tools into its daily marketing workflows to manage the increasing demand for high-volume digital content. **Source:** AI News ↗ **Summary:** Trilogy, a technology company specializing in publishing solutions, has launched a new AI-powered platform designed to assist publishers in the early-stage assessment of manuscripts. **Summary:** During its CES 2026 keynote, NVIDIA officially unveiled its latest flagship AI platform, codenamed "Vera Rubin." Following the Blackwell architecture, the Rubin platform introduces radical improvements in processing power and memory bandwidth, specifically engineered to handle the massive scaling requirements of trillion-parameter models. **Summary:** Crescendo.ai has partnered with Amazon to integrate Nova Sonic, a high-speed LLM model, into its voice AI platform. **Summary:** Lloyds Bank has introduced Athena, a generative AI tool designed to support customer service and internal operations. **Summary:** The U.S. Department of Defense has partnered with four commercial tech companies to accelerate AI integration into military operations. **Summary:** Scientists have developed an AI model that mimics human decision-making with high accuracy in complex moral and social dilemmas.
